task.title: Viewing appliance users by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view appliance users by using the user list command on the command line.

taskbody.context: You can view appliance users by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view appliance users, see .The commands must be capitalized as shown.

step.cmd: To view a list of all the appliance users, enter the following command:
To view a specific appliance user, enter the following command:
step.info:
The command must be capitalized as shown.
user list "UserID=UserID" "Type=WebUI"Where:
UserID Specifies the user ID of the appliance user you want to view.

taskbody.example: The following example shows viewing a list of appliance users: user list "Type=WebUI" UserID: admin Group Membership: SystemAdministrators
